dcterms:description: A dataset for breast carcinoma subtyping consisting of 2080 regions of interest (RoIs) acquired from H&E stained whole-slide images, annotated by pathologists.
dcterms:title: BReAst Carcinoma Subtyping (BRACS)

dcterms:description: A dataset used for a grand challenge on breast cancer histology images, providing a benchmark for evaluating image analysis algorithms.
dcterms:title: BACH

dcterms:description: A dataset and technique for generalized nuclear segmentation in computational pathology, providing annotated images for training segmentation algorithms.
dcterms:title: Multi-organ nuclei segmentation dataset
